name: set-volume-for-users-playback
description: Set the volume for the userâ€™s current playback device.

volume_percent.description: The volume to set. Must be a value from 0 to 100 inclusive.
volume_percent.title: Volume %

device_id.description: The id of the device this command is targeting. If not supplied, the user's currently active device is the target.
device_id.title: Device ID
